text: Theory why Repubs don't stand up to Trump. After the 2016 election, the Russian active measures campaign turned to building kompromat on every Republican member of Congress. It didn't take long to get each one of them in a position where they had to listen to Russia and Trump. This is one of those "Occam's News" things. Like black holes in space, you can't see them, but you can infer their presence by the way bodies behave around them
